flavorText: When mortals claim there are places Thassa cannot reach, the sea god laughs.

foreignData.flavorText: Wenn die Sterblichen behaupten, es gäbe Orte, die Thassa nicht erreichen könne, kann sich die Meeresgöttin ein Lachen nicht verkneifen.
foreignData.name: Thassas Verschlinger
foreignData.text: Konstellation — Immer wenn Thassas Verschlinger oder eine andere Verzauberung unter deiner Kontrolle ins Spiel kommt, legt ein Spieler deiner Wahl die obersten zwei Karten seiner Bibliothek auf seinen Friedhof.

foreignData.flavorText: Cuando los mortales afirman que hay lugares que Tassa no puede alcanzar, la diosa de los mares ríe.
foreignData.name: Devoradora de Tassa
foreignData.text: Constelación — Siempre que la Devoradora de Tassa u otro encantamiento entre al campo de batalla bajo tu control, el jugador objetivo pone las dos primeras cartas de su biblioteca en su cementerio.

foreignData.flavorText: Lorsque les mortels prétendent qu'il existe des lieux que Thassa ne saurait atteindre, la déesse de la mer éclate de rire.
foreignData.name: Dévoreur de Thassa
foreignData.text: Constellation — À chaque fois que le Dévoreur de Thassa ou un autre enchantement arrive le champ de bataille sous votre contrôle, le joueur ciblé met les deux cartes du dessus de sa bibliothèque dans son cimetière.

foreignData.flavorText: Quando i mortali parlano di luoghi che Thassa non può raggiungere, la dea del mare ride.
foreignData.name: Divoratrice di Thassa
foreignData.text: Costellazione — Ogniqualvolta la Divoratrice di Thassa o un altro incantesimo entrano nel campo di battaglia sotto il tuo controllo, un giocatore bersaglio mette nel suo cimitero le prime due carte del suo grimorio.

foreignData.flavorText: タッサが到達できない場所があると定命の者たちが吹聴するたびに、海の神は笑い声をあげる。
foreignData.name: タッサの貪り食い
foreignData.text: 星座 ― タッサの貪り食いか他のエンチャントが１つあなたのコントロール下で戦場に出るたび、プレイヤー１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーは自分のライブラリーの一番上から２枚のカードを自分の墓地に置く。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー・エンチャント — エレメンタル

foreignData.flavorText: 필멸자들이 타사가 가지 못하는 곳이 있다고 주장할 때, 바다의 신은 웃는다.
foreignData.name: 타사의 탐식자
foreignData.text: 성좌 — 타사의 탐식자나 다른 부여마법이 당신의 조종 하에 전장에 들어올 때마다, 플레이어를 목표로 정한다. 그 플레이어는 자신의 서고 맨 위의 카드 두 장을 무덤에 넣는다.

foreignData.flavorText: Quando os mortais dizem que há lugares que Tassa não pode alcançar, a deusa do mar dá gargalhadas.
foreignData.name: Devoradora de Tassa
foreignData.text: Constelação — Toda vez que Devoradora de Tassa ou outro encantamento entra no campo de batalha sob o seu controle, o jogador alvo coloca os dois cards do topo do grimório dele no próprio cemitério.

foreignData.flavorText: Когда смертные говорят про места, до которых Тассе не добраться, морская богиня смеется.
foreignData.name: Пожиратель Тассы
foreignData.text: Созвездие — Каждый раз, когда Пожиратель Тассы или другие чары выходят на поле битвы под вашим контролем, целевой игрок кладет две верхние карты своей библиотеки на свое кладбище.

foreignData.flavorText: 凡人宣称世上有塔萨能力未及之处，而海神发笑。
foreignData.name: 塔萨的吞噬兽
foreignData.text: 星彩～每当塔萨的吞噬兽或另一个结界在你的操控下进战场时，目标牌手将其牌库顶的两张牌置入其坟墓场。

foreignData.flavorText: 凡人宣稱世上有塔薩能力未及之處，而海神發笑。
foreignData.name: 塔薩的吞噬獸
foreignData.text: 星彩～每當塔薩的吞噬獸或另一個結界在你的操控下進戰場時，目標玩家將其牌庫頂的兩張牌置入其墳墓場。

name: Thassa's Devourer
originalText: Constellation — Whenever Thassa's Devourer or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, target player puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

rulings.text: A constellation ability triggers whenever an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control for any reason. Enchantments with other card types, such as enchantment creatures, will also cause constellation abilities to trigger.

An Aura spell without bestow that has an illegal target when it tries to resolve won't resolve and will be put into its owner's graveyard. It won't enter the battlefield and constellation abilities won't trigger. An Aura spell with bestow won't be countered this way. It will revert to being an enchantment creature and resolve, entering the battlefield and triggering constellation abilities.

When an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, each constellation ability of permanents you control will trigger. You can put these abilities on the stack in any order. The last ability you put on the stack will be the first one that resolves.

text: Constellation — Whenever Thassa's Devourer or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, target player mills two cards.
